goal.en: Experience and solidify the learning of Digital Logic System with practical development environment for digital logic system design.
goal.ch: 使用實務數位邏輯系統設計發展環境進行數位邏輯電路實驗，以體驗落實數位邏輯系統之學習。

content.en:
週次 內容 備註
1 課程簡介與實驗分組
2 Xilinx ISE/Vivado/HDL-Verilog/Schematic
3 Basic Logic Gates & Boolean Algebra
4 Algebra Simplification & Karnaugh Maps-I
5 Algebra Simplification & Karnaugh Maps-II
6 Decoder/Encoder
7 Seven Segment Display & LEDs
8 Read-Only-Memory (ROM)/Programmable Logic Arrays (PLA)
9 Mid-Term Exam
10 Filp-Flops
11 Counters
12 Sequential Logic Circuits
13 Finite State Machine and Applications
14 Arithmetic Circuits-Adder/ Subtractor, Multiplier/Divider
15 Arithmetic Circuits-CORDIC
16 Register Files & Random-Access-Memory (RAM)
17 Push-Down/Pop-Up Stacks/First-In-First-Out Queue (Buffer)
18 Final Exam
